item.title: *Urgent* Video Editing Project - Upwork
item.description:
I need short videos created 30-60 seconds from stock video footage.

I will provide a script, audio, and the stock footage. I need the videos created to zoom in on the "characters" as they speak.

This is an extremely urgent project and I'm hoping to find someone who can begin immediately and produce a video today.  

I can also provide a sample of the video. It just needs to look more professional.

If you are able to complete multiple videos today, please let me know.

It should amount to importing audio and video into your editing software and aligning the images to the audio and creating transitions (fade/Ken Burns, etc).

item.title: Seeking Video Editor from India for YouTube Channel with Sanskrit Subtitles - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

I am looking for a video editor from India to collaborate on creating content for my new YouTube channel. The videos I need will have subtitles in Sanskrit and their transliteration (the pronunciation guide of the lyrics).

Requirements:

Native of India: Preferably with knowledge of Sanskrit and Hindi.
Experience in video editing: Ability to create attractive and high-quality videos.
Subtitling: Skill in adding subtitles in Sanskrit and their transliteration.
English communication: Good communication in English is essential to ensure better understanding and efficiency in video creation.

Responsibilities:

Create and edit videos based on provided songs.
Add subtitles in Sanskrit and their transliteration.
Ensure the delivery of high-quality videos.
Continuously collaborate on producing a significant amount of videos.

Long-term collaboration.

Additional Information:

Please provide examples of your work for both "easy" and "intermediate" levels of video editing. Additionally, I would like to receive separate budget estimates for both levels to consider which option would work best for me.

If you meet the requirements and are interested in this opportunity, please send me your portfolio and a brief description of your experience. I look forward to working with you to create meaningful and educational content.

Thank you!

Examples;
-Easy
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V7ADN6-U_lw&t=1255s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bukN2P7WpwE&t=432s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sac8dsPB4nk&t=2108s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F6mkyo0u5Xk

-intermedium
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTFGb-Ce96U

https://youtu.be/kxxhO92X8ro?si=iFlsrD1xjwLy4sdZ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zdcth9NndEA&t=260s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZYxdhMAF4F0

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SarlTxrAbIY&t=89s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tBgNpc39FJk&list=PLgcAzyvSIsn3Bm_lxmo1k16NmlMTtUc2O



Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Music Video, Video Editing, Video Production

item.title: Outlook meeting and calendar video tutorial - Upwork
item.description:
We created a set of five training videos (and accompanying lesson plan) teaching Outlook meeting setup  and Outlook calendar use. Each video is 2-5 minutes long.  However the quality, volume and professionalism is not what it needs to be. We are seeking someone who has mastery over the Outlook subject matter, is extremely eloquent, with an American or Canadian accent, to recreate the videos.  All five lessons will be provided (in Word format, as well as the original videos).

Lesson 1 provided is provided here for demonstrative purposes.

If this project is successful and on budget, we'd like to do a few additional lessons on Teams meetings (sound/video setup...) and then we can move on to our proprietary software.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$24.00

Category: Acting
Skills:US English Dialect, Canadian English Dialect, Female, Male, Product Knowledge, Microsoft Outlook, Video Editing, Training Design, Training Materials

item.title: Video Producer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Producer

Job Description:

We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Video Producer to join our team on a commission-based contract. In this role, you will create engaging visual content by overlaying B-roll footage, AI-generated images, and Google images onto pre-recorded voice-over audio files. Your primary responsibility will be to use your best judgment to select the most appropriate visuals that complement the audio content.

You will be provided accounts for StoryBlocks and ChatGPT-4 to access the necessary video and image content. This position requires minimal editing skills—simply drag the pre-made audio file with the narration into your editing software and overlay the relevant videos or images.

Responsibilities:

- Overlay B-roll videos, AI-generated images (using ChatGPT-4), and Google images onto provided audio voice-overs.
- Ensure that visuals are relevant and enhance the storytelling of the audio content.
- Utilize StoryBlocks for accessing B-roll footage.
- Maintain efficiency and responsiveness in producing a minimum of one 20-minute video per day.
- Ensure 100% good English comprehension to accurately match visuals with the audio content.
- Upload completed videos as per the project requirements.

Requirements:

- Strong understanding of visual storytelling.
- Excellent English comprehension.
- Reliable high-speed internet connection (minimum 100mb/s).
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
- No prior video editing required, but a good eye for relevant and - engaging visuals is essential.

Compensation:

$30 per completed 20-minute video.
- Commission-based pay with no cap on the number of videos you can produce.
- Minimum production of one video per day, with a total project scope of 840 videos total.

If you are efficient, responsive, and have a keen eye for visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and contribute to an exciting and large-scale project!

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:37 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Elearning Video, Narrated Presentation, Stock Footage, Video Production, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: MP4, Elearning Video, Narrated Presentation, Stock Footage, Video Production, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Education
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Research Sports Videos and edit for tiktok - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for sports videos focused on Caitlin Clark a women's basketball player in the USA.
Freelancer will need to find videos of Clark's aggressive behavior and anger management issues and assemble into a series of videos. These include: fouls, technicals, bad body language, lack of socialization, not listening to the coach, being upset about teammates missing shots, etc.
I would like a series of 12 videos created to start, about 30-90 seconds in length.

item.title: I am looking for a video editor for for my youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!


I am looking for a professional to create / edit one YouTube video.
The length of the video should be between 10-15 minutes long.
I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

I am are looking for someone who:
- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience using video editing softwares such as Adobe Premiere Pro
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline (24 hours)

- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.
However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging.

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite animal at the beginning of your proposal.

videol examples:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wmtchNDcnGk&t=291s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pdUtTNa8I-0

Also, if you’ve ever made a youtube cashcow video. please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!


Budget: $35
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Audio work on Final Cut Pro - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I've been making videos for a long time, but never felt that my audio was on par with my competitors. I use limiters/eq/and a few other tools. But somehow they never quite sound as good as I like them.

I'm looking for someone that can help me fix this, I'm only interested in someone using final cut pro. I can give you the audio file in a FCP library and I want to see what you come up with. Let me know your favorite color so I know you read this.

Thanks!

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media Paid Campaigns - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert video editor to join our team and help us create engaging videos for our social media paid campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of video editing techniques and be able to make our videos stand out with punchy animation and captivating images. As a video editor, you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects and collaborate with our marketing team to create content that effectively promotes our brand.
  Responsibilities:
  - Edit videos for social media paid campaigns
  - Create punchy animation and captivating images
  - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop creative concepts
  - Ensure videos are visually appealing and aligned with our brand identity
  Required Skills:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of video editing techniques and best practices
  - Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail
  - Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality results
  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor who can bring fresh ideas to the table and help us elevate our social media presence.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Editing, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Video Editing, Instagram
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Photography Expert Needed for Course Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

We're seeking an experienced photographer to create high-quality visual content for an online photography course. The ideal photographer will have:

- 5+ years of professional photography experience
- Strong technical skills across various camera types and lighting setups
- Expertise in composition, color theory, and post-processing
- Ability to create clear, instructional images demonstrating photography concepts

The goal:
- Develop 10-15 before/after image sets showing editing processes
- Produce short video clips demonstrating camera handling and setup
- Deliverables should be suitable for online course presentation. - Strong communication skills and ability to explain complex concepts visually are essential.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$45.00

item.title: Job Posting: YouTube Channel Manager and Setup Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Job Posting: YouTube Channel Manager and Setup Expert

Location: Remote

Position: YouTube Channel Manager and Setup Expert

About Us:
We are a team of seasoned SEO experts dedicated to helping business owners succeed through proven strategies and valuable insights. We are launching a new YouTube channel to share our knowledge, experiences, and tips on SEO and digital marketing. To ensure our channel's success, we are looking for a talented YouTube Channel Manager and Setup Expert to join our team.

Job Description:
As a YouTube Channel Manager and Setup Expert, you will play a crucial role in the successful launch and growth of our YouTube channel. Your primary responsibilities will include developing a comprehensive YouTube strategy, setting up the channel for optimal performance, and continuously optimizing content to maximize reach and engagement. You will work closely with our SEO team to create compelling videos that demonstrate our expertise and provide valuable content to our audience.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement a comprehensive YouTube strategy to launch and grow the channel
Set up the YouTube channel, including creating channel art, optimizing descriptions, and organizing playlists
Conduct keyword research and optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails for maximum visibility
Plan and schedule content, ensuring a consistent upload schedule
Analyze channel performance and provide actionable insights to improve video reach and engagement
Collaborate with our SEO team to ensure content aligns with our overall marketing strategy
Stay up-to-date with YouTube trends, algorithm changes, and best practices
Engage with our audience through comments and community posts to build a loyal subscriber base
Qualifications:

Proven experience in managing and optimizing YouTube channels
Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and best practices
Excellent knowledge of video production and editing tools
Ability to analyze data and generate actionable insights
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging and informative content
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Detail-oriented and highly organized
Passion for digital marketing and SEO
Benefits:

Competitive salary
Flexible working hours
Opportunity to work with a team of SEO experts
Room for growth and professional development
Collaborative and supportive work environment

Hourly Range: $17.00-$59.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:39 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Internet Marketing
Skills: YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Internet Marketing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for YouTube and IG Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor who specializes in editing YouTube videos and IG reels. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of current editing trends for these platforms. The main tasks will include trimming and organizing footage, adding transitions and effects, syncing audio, and ensuring the final videos meet the desired quality standards. The editor should also have experience with color correction, audio enhancement, and text/graphic overlays. Strong communication skills and the ability to meet deadlines are essential. If you are passionate about creating engaging videos for social media, we want to hear from you!

Looking for someone who can edit a few projects to show capabilities then potentially turn into long term work.  This is a per project assignment.  We will do per reel & per youtube video at different compensation.  

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: VSL Video Editor (Meta Ads) - Upwork
item.description:
Are you fantastic at creating high converting VSLs?

Then this could be the perfect job for you!

I'm looking for a video editor who can dedicate at least 10-20 hours per week (possibly up to 40 hours) to creating VSLs for my Ecommerce Brand.

The videos will be from 60 seconds to 10 minutes long, and are in the wellness niche.

The ads will be used for Facebook ads.

Compensation is highly dependent on skill level. You can expect a rate between $7-$15 per hour.

I have a simple brief prepared for a short VSL. This will be used to test out your skills.

Please answer the questions below with a LOOM video or similar.

1. Have you ever created VSLs for Facebook before?
2. How many hours per week are you available?
3. What was your last job/project? How did it end?
4. What are your career goals?
5. Do you have any other relevent skills?
6. Please attach an example of your work!

Again - please submit a loom video of you answering these questions. ONLY applicants who respond with a video or audio recording will be considered.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 15:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
